thread.section_title: ALittleLuxury.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ALittleLuxury.com.au | alittleluxury.com.au
thread.title: Maria Cariaso

author: Maria Cariaso
title: Maria Cariaso
text: I have never ordered a gift basket online and was very pleased with the experience I had on A Little Luxury. You can select a pre-made gift basket with selected products in it but the best part is that you can switch out any of the products with others of your choice! You can also choose other personalization options like which box and ribbon you'd like to use and even add in more products if you want. I just loved it. The order and shipping process was also spot on! No errors and fast and timely delivery by my preferred date, I would definitely recommend A Little Luxury. I loved the service and options but my boyfriend loved the gift even more! 5 stars!!
